Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text:
WOW!!!!
We had the potato skins they were absolutely incredibly delicious! I also had the daily special on the drinks and it was bomb!!! Matt our server was so friendly ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: We ordered  a walk in the park, a cocktail with ford's gin, lime, agave and aragula. It's very good but the glass is a little small. Also, we ordered the burguer with ground sirloin, caramelized onions, manchego, baby aragula and brioche ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Decent gastropub food. Loved the wings, the street corn was interesting. Love the mix and mingle patio, met some really nice people here. My buffalo chicken wrap was surprisingly satisfying, the fries were pretty standard. Service was good, ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The best item on the menu is actually not on the menu. Ask for the "Frenchie" hot dog (Basically gruyere, caramelized onions and a perfectly toasted bun) ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Service was friendly and COVID compliant.  Cauliflower and mussels were excellent, wings and fries smothered in cheese were good.  Will return to try the hot dog and some other items that looked good.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Was there for super bowl watching party.  Great food, drink specials and craft beers.  Awesome service too!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Excellent beer selection with good service and very good buffalo wings.  I ordered a "small plate " hamburger with gruyere cheese for my dog.  He found it quite tasty.  Will definitely return.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Love this great locals hangout. Excellent beer selection, fun tasty cocktails and a rotating menu using seasonal ingredients! I particularity love the pasta of the day EVERYTIME I get it. Great ambience, your pup is welcome here and it's probably the best outdoor patio in NoHo, and bonus, a little hidden bar in the back.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great food, amazing vibes and service. Ask for the half priced bottles of wine. I think is on Tuesdays! üëåüèæ

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: My kids and I loved the fried chicken, burger, nutella mousse, and fried oreo sundae ‚ù§ the presentation was perfect - not pretentious or self indulgent, rather comfortable and inviting. Pub grub at its best. Can't wait to try more from the menu üòä

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: We were seated quickly despite it being busy. Had brunch and the service was great, was food was amazing and reasonably priced. Great vibes all around.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Doggie style flavours this space. Outdoor seating area is fabulous.  one Can kick back and relax bali style on the large sofas. Pub style food, delicious and well presented.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great servers and service experience. Clever food presentations, excellent drink menu options, very accommodating staff! Great place for a party!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: A lovely place to eat leisurely meal. The Fat Dog has great food and friendly service. Even though it is not nearby, we'll return.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I've had drinks here a few times. The staff is friendly and the service is always good. Great tap selection, full bar, and the food is delicious as well.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The menu is fabulous- the food is fantastic- we had the tomato soup and cheese sandwich, cheese board and fish and chips - all were excellent

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Came here for drinks with a friend after work on a Wednesday night. Great chill vibe, nice selection of cocktails and good happy hour option if you‚Äôre a whiskey drinker. Whiskey Wednesday! Even though I don‚Äôt often drink whiskey I had ‚ÄúThe ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food was expensive, but just ok. Ambience was nice. Service was quick. Came in not knowing where to sit cuz all the tables seemed reserved.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: A good selection of appetizers and entrees to fit most diets. Cool ambiance with indoor and outdoor seating. Music is just quiet enough for conversation. Dogs welcome! ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Awesome place. The food is really tasty, atmosphere is great (including a really large outdoor patio that is dog friendly) and staff are friendly. Great happy hour prices as well - something that's hard to find around this area!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: So yummy and great selection!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Amazing in this gastropub, they have very wide selection of foods and drinks and to be honest the prices are fair.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food and drinks were good. I had a on the leash drink which was good. Only got it cause it had bourbon in it. The people I was with didn't like it but hey I was the one that ordered it. I ordered the Buffalo chicken wrap. It wasn't hot at ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Hot, plus good looking people in Gen-Yeas the Chosen frequent here AND RED BEER on tap. #gg

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great breakfast bites like chicken fried chicken and short rib hash.  Delicious biscuits and cool brunch cocktails like IPA and orange juice.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Upon entering the location it was a little gloomy with candles on the tables to set the mood. This is a very upscale bar. The food on the other hand is Gourmet bar food, the food was very delicious and the staff very friendly. I would definitely come back here again hopefully next time the Dodgers win.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Came here for brunch and had a great time. They have a good selection of drinks and beers on tap. The food was delicious, I had the chicken fried chicken. The service was on point as well. The only downside is parking can be a bit of a pain.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great cocktails . Food is pretty good.  Fish and chips was actually pretty bomb.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great atmosphere! Wonderful service! Food was awesome!!! I'm going back!!!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Delicious meals and amazing patio. It‚Äôs a brunch!!!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great Brunch in NoHo...  Somehow we've missed this spot over the years but on our first visit New Years day the food and service were fantastic.  Definitely try the Chicken Fried Chicken and Baked Eggs delicious.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Amazing food! Great for brunch, and you can bring your dog too! They even have bowls for your pets on the outside seating area.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The servers were extremely professional and friendly. Service was excellent. The food delicious.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Fat dog is a great spot to sit down for beers and above average pub food no doubt. I had the mini burger‚Äî it was great for a snack.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Very good service, decent food. The prices are average LA (so fairly expensive), and it's all your average fatty, salty, and yummy stuff. Drinks were good too. Overall, would recommend.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Nice environment, good foods. People who work there are very nice too!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Good drinks, the service is spotty and the menu changes every time I'm there. Dog friendly, so lots of doggos. Not a bad place for a drink and a snack.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: First night in NOHO and came here for dinner. The steak frites are amazing and the cheeseboard and the Mexican street corn! Also the beer menu is top notch. Can't wait to return. And the atmosphere is so relaxed. There service was also incredible everyone was attentive!!!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Went here with my best friends over a month ago for the first time. They had quickly ordered the seaweed salad, which they had before, as I tried to figure out what to get for myself. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: My wife and I love Fat Dog! Work the whole menu!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: We stopped here after a long day of driving back and forth to Santa Barbara. My son recommended the place. He said we'd love it. We did. I had the Fat Dog of course. I needed to experience one and I knew I could pick off the plates of my son and my wife. Great place. Find your way there when you can.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Absolutely love this place. Came for the fish and chips but they ran out(which should tell you that they keep it fresh!), so I ordered the mussels instead. Couldn't have been happier ‚ò∫

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Cool vibe! Awesome drinks and delicious appetizers

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: They have a somewhat limited menu, but what they do have is always excellent!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Enjoyed this place more than I expected. Parking is horrendous but worth it. Great service

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Finally, the beautiful people! And beer, pet friendly! Gen-Yes rejoice!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I had a dinner with a friend here and ordered the burger which was delicious!! I really love burgers and really this was the best I've ever had so far ! High quality !! ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Since I moved to NoHo, this has become one of my most beloved places. Most of their menu is delicious, but I always get the Hot Wings and Rainbow Fries. A bit messy since they serve whole wings, but always delicious. Their beer list is ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Really good food! Love the atmosphere. Happy hour is great prices, especially half-off bottles of wine on Tuesday! I had the elotes corn and Mac n cheese. Both were outstanding!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great wine and beer flights plus great service. Daily pasta always a good choice

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great beer selection! Whiskey Wednesdays and Wino Tuesdays are the best. To eat, I usually get the alternative burger made vegan and it's delicious. The fries are amazing too and even come with a tasty vegan dip! I wish the burger buns were vegan too, but the lettuce replacement is still tasty.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Absolutely amazing. Stuff was great food amazing and well priced.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food was great and the vibe of the place was cool. You can bring your furry friends as well.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The parking is pretty horrendous but I guess that's what you'd expect in any Los Angeles hipster neighborhood! Once you find a place to park, however the drinks and food are definitely worth it. I recommend staying away from the fish and ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Their brunch menu is great. Their version of a Bloody Mary was spot on. Too many good things to pick from their drink menu. The place is also dog friendly as if that‚Äôs a surprise with a name like The Fat Dog

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: This place is pretty awesome, especially if you like dogs. People bring their dogs here and the animals, when I went, were well behaved. Avoid if you have dog allergies.  The food is good and they serve alcohol during brunch. I am not sure ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The food is delicious! Ample space for a fun dinner party or to spend quiet time at the bar. The food is reasonably priced and they have a variety of drinks so you can't go wrong.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Would happily revise two more stars if they can fix their staffing issues. Otherwise, I don't want to recommend people go there on a weekday for lunch. Delicious food, but not prepared for the lunch rush. I really don't understand this ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great outdoor seating. Great service. Took time to find parking but so worth it. Cannot wait to go back. The salad is addicting!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: This place has the food, prices, drinks, crowd and decor that people just love. They got everything right here. I love their small plates. I love that they have a few communal tables. That is such a good idea in a bar environment. The ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I love the Fat Dog burger! Great service!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Been meaning to make it to the noho location since one of our favorites, the West Hollywood location, closed. Great as ever (best burger)! Love the outdoor space. Had to park a bit away, totally worth the walk.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great place for groups ants outdoor drinks!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Went here for my friend's birthday. Beers are around $7, cocktails $9+, unlimited soda refills even if you're just drinking. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Good food and great selection of beers. I certainly hope they keep the outdoor space around as long as possible!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food was delicious, service was GREAT. Especially compared to Kahuna Tiki next door, they were behind the 8 ball. I'd go to Fat Dog a million times over, loved it

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text:
You can taste the grill on these hamburgers.

Fine selection of beers on tap and excellent liquor on the shelves. Service ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food is pretty good, but service is very casual. It's really more a bar that serves food than a restaurant. And if you happen to go during brunch, they only serve from the brunch menu, which is a little annoying. But they do have a large patio where you can hang out with your doggo, and that makes it worth it

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Used their dog friendly patio for brunch. Got a creme brulee granola cup that was great. It looked like they mixed their own granola and typed it with fresh yogurt preserves and honey. Had a good beer and cocktail selection to choose from while you much on your food. Got a seasonal pumpkin beer that was. The staff was attentive.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Delicious! Dog friendly patio with a good vibe

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: An incredible gastropub that has a dog friendly patio, incredible drinks, and delicious food for both humans and pups alike!  Eddy (the corgi)  sure LOVED his chicken!  And I loved everything I ordered as well.  Come by sometime for great atmosphere and some quality time with your fur-babies!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text:
The Nice people, good service, the pictures do not do justice to this place. It is bigger on the the inside than the photos suggest.
I ordered what the the bartender called the lager, very tasty. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Everyone should try this restaurant. They are the best across the state! Great food, cozy ambiance, the staff and crew were lively and polite. Everything was perfect. You can enjoy a sumptuous meal together with your family. This place is highly recommended.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: My favorite Bloody Mary in LA. Just the right amount of heavy on the horseradish. The food is hard to beat. Consistently great. It‚Äôs pricier than its neighbors but you‚Äôll notice when you taste the food. Great place for football if you‚Äôre trying to avoid a loud sports bar.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food was mediocre at best. Burger was basically raw and had no seasoning. Beet salad was tasty, as was the bread pudding. Atmosphere is so snobbish. And parking is non existent. Won't be back.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The Fat Dog is a nice trendy place with a youthful vibe. It has indoor and outdoor seating with two bars. There is a mister to keep the outside cool in the hot weatherboard The food is good. I found the service attentive when I didn't need ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: This has become my favorite Noho spot for dinner and drinks in an area dense with gastropubs and bars. The food is so good. This is actually my mom's favorite burger, and I don't blame her; its juicy and filling and rewards you with each ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great place when you can get service. My friend has waited 45 minutes to get her order taken when sitting at the tables. I always sit at the bar and service is fine. On Valentine's day we did have to flag down our server, but I do enjoy ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Cozy outdoor patio to enjoy a late bite and talk without to much noise. Short rib sandwich is scrumptious beyond my wildest imagination. Also loved the presentation of the tomato soup with sandwich.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The food was pricey. They will not make substitutions, or remove an item even if your allergic. I asked about removing something I was allergic to, the waitress gave me a dirty look and reminded me that they make no substitutions. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text:
Cream of tomato soup was very good. It came with a small toasted cheese sandwich made with artisan bread.
The pasta daily special was disappointing. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Fantastic cocktails, and I usually enjoy the dog drink of the day, which is a nice deal. The food is actually really good too, but I tend to go for the drinks. They have a "no substitutions" thing on their menu.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: We live across the street from this place, and while there are tons of restaurants in the NoHo arts district, this is always the place we go.  The food is excellent, the portions are not small or huge, they're right at that spot that allows ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Absolutely LOVED this place. My only complaint is that I wish I lived closer üòÄ The food and drinks were amazing, service and staff were excellent. And the place is filled with portraits and paintings of mainly English bulldogs, some ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great place, beer selection and gastro pub!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I had the veggie burger! Omg!!! So so good. I wasn‚Äôt even that hungry when I went. Absolutely delicious. Ordered sweet potato fries. They are very generous with the fries! U can actually share them with 4 people. The dips are amazing!!! Aoili, lemon aioli Wow!!!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Love their cocktails here and their comfort food. I'm a big fan of their Mac and cheese... I usually get it with crab! There is some great outdoor seating, but sitting inside at the bar is always fun too!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: On the verge of pricier than I'd like but overall I really like the place. Good food, drinks, beer selection, and service. Good TV's for an interesting fusion that can't be fully called a sports bar. Convenient for when there's a game I'd like to watch and hang out with friends who are not sports fans.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Slow service.  Food ok. The idea is to keep your party ordering drinks.  If the food was great 2 more stars but the combo brought the best score to a 2.75.  In addition mgmt confrontational so best to say nothing or better yet look ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Fun and casual gastropub in NoHo. Good mix of indoor and outdoor seating, good cocktail and beer selection and reasonable prices. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Here on a Friday at 6:30 no reservation. Was seated immediately and food was quick and fresh! Drink "Well Groomed" was delicious. Chicken Sandwich was tasty. Service was awesome. Clean and fun decor. Will return for sure. üòä

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great bar in NoHo. Good craft beer selection, and the food is top notch. Not wide ranging, but tasty. Same with the drink selection. A great jump off, or mid night choice. If you are a pet owner, daily options to bring your love ones in ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: excellent drinks and well placed for both inside and outdoors dining. it is a "gastropub" in that their dining selections and preparations are exceptional. biggest problem is parking in this area. good luck with that!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: All of the staff are great!!!!!!!!!!! Awesome food and they love dogs!!!!!!! Especially when your new little guy(4 month old dachshund) named Gaston gets all the attention!!!!! I flew in from Denver just for the day to get my pup and looked ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Doggo Friendly!. Tasty food, friendly staff, indoor and outdoor seating. Serves beer, wine and cocktails. Vegetarian friendly!. Prices are fair. Parking can be difficult- meter parking available.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great place for dogs, and food.... This dog friendly establishment has a great menu for bar food. Also some great special's for whiskey, & full bar. The atmosphere of the day or night patio is an enjoyable experience.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Though our server seemed to have a chip on his shoulder about something, the food was stellar. The Fat Dog is a must try for everybody... It's a hot dog masterpiece. The veggie burger seemed to hate structural integrity; despite it's aversion to staying in one piece, it was super!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Standard anyplace USA gastropub. Good service, good food.  Good for groups. It‚Äôs on the positive side of meh.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The food was tasty. The staff was friendly and sociable. The place has a nice atmosphere. Food is similar to a cafe in Indianapolis I loved.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Love their deviled eggs and hot dog.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I love the burgers and marry's chicken now they have a cheese French fries mmmmm!!!!!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I've been here three times and the experience has been very good each time. The food is generally pretty tasty, but nothing that I'd rave about to friends or family. It's a very comfortable place to hang out and have a drink with friends.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Cool bar with indoor and outdoor bars. Great for getting together with friends over beers and pub style food. Another great thing about this restaurant is its location, perfectly located a few doors down from Republic of Pie, which is a must at the end of the evening!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: So I ate the hot wings and fries at 4:30PM. I‚Äôve been throwing up and using the bathroom since 10:45PM last night. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Good food, good prices on brunch drinks and attentive service. The patio is great and comfy for weekend brunch with an outdoor bar for service. Patio is also dog-friendly. Major downfall is horrible parking, but that doesn't deter from good food and service.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: One of my favorite spots in NoHo. Great drinks, great food & not to expensive. Plus there are dog paintings all over the place. And oh yeah, it's dog friendly too.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Cool little spot in the middle of noho. Great lunch spot to take anyone.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great food, great service.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Good food, great staff, great bartenders.  The food is always good, with midrange prices, and decent service.  The design is adequate for families, singles, and groups of adults, with upbeat modern music, airy and open indoors, with ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: A small menu but what they do offer is fantastic. They also have a great draft beer menu that rotates pretty frequently. Great atmosphere and they allow dogs!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: So I was at the Tam O'Shanter thoroughly meh'd by the Mac and cheese which got us talking about Mac and cheese and all the places that make great Mac and also just great food. The Fat Dog is at the top of the list for food, great cocktails, great atmosphere, and great service üëç

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great food for a good price, their pasta of the day is always a hit. I have yet to try their drinks, but I am sure they are equally delicious. Great, quick, and friendly service as well.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Came here for a party. Had the Burger, it was the most tasteless nightmare of a "Burger" I have ever had. I found out I was not alone in the burger being horrible... When I brought this to the servers attention he took it back and said he ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I absolutely love this place! It is cozy, it is sophisticated, the food is fantastic! It‚Äôs great for out-of-town visitors, it‚Äôs great for happy hour, it‚Äôs got an eclectic menu... I‚Äôm vegan and there is plenty on the menu for me‚Ä¶ü§ìüòã

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Just had dinner at the Magnolia location - food was great but what really prompted me to write this review is that after a good dinner my whole prospective changed; I was walking out and waiting for my car, an extremely intoxicated couple ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Cute Noho gastropub with a nice patio and a bulldog theme.  Try the Daily Fat Drink.  Always interesting and only  $7.00.  Tasty bar bites, moderately priced during happy hour, 3-7 pm M-F.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food and cocktails were delicious. Awesome atmosphere.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: i love this place always quality food & service. prices that won't break you. i can see why they have a lot of good reviews.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Had a awesome experience in this spot with my wife. The food arrived rapidly and the customer service is just fantastic. Prices are affordable.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Super friendly staff knows the importance of making a customer feel welcome.  Happy hour menu lets you have introductory portions to larger menu items. Great place.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: You want an amazing medium rare Fresh Hamburger. That is juicy and  on a freshly baked Bun with a side Rainbow Fries .This is the place ,and service they all work together to make you feel special .

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I like the food, though I don't like sweet breads and staff but the burgers were awesome. Just this place is a little bit pricey. Service is good too.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Loved this place! Great atmosphere, with a nice bar, seating area and patio with cooling mist jets. The food is fantastic and decent prices. Staff was very friendly and quick.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I live right across the street so that's a HUGE plus! The room is big and open, with partly covered outdoor seating (just enough to block sunlight on those extra sunny days. I tried the Dog Bite and it was great perfect refreshing cocktail ‚Ä¶

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Always 5 stars. Love this place so much that when my friends schedule brunch with me they pick this place! A great spot to be a regular for brunch, dinner or drinks.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: My boyfriend and I met here. So....it's a favorite. Food is super yummy. Good beer selection. Eric, the manager, is fantastic.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great food and nice atmosphere. Try to sit outside in the courtyard. Has a small selection of craft beers but they're pretty good.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: They're super nice and the food is good. Been once for lunch and once for dinner. Lots of outdoor seating and a solid beer list. Yum yum.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I know there's a few negative reviews however we stopped by without a reservation and were greeted right away. Once we sat down at the bar, the bartender was attentive and greeted us right away!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Food is pretty good, drinks are great, but you can't substitute roasted potatoes for fruit on the brunch menu...

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great happy hour and plenty of fun after. Great burger and tasty beer list. Beers on hH never disappoint.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: A good little dive bar like place. Nothing too special but a fun place to hang out low key with your friends. The patio was closed unfortunately but I hear it's nice!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Well decorated, dog themed bar. Good food. Busy, but not too loud. Nice outdoor patio area. Friendly staff.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Came for their happy hour and left very happy.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Delicious comfort food. Great draft beer selection. Fun atmosphere. Will be back!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great service. Great food. I recommend eating outside. If you are looking for place to bring you best friend (dog) well you found it.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great beer selection and portion sizes for their standard food fare

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Friendly neighborhood gastropub with great eats and Happy Hour. Perfect for beer, wine, or cocktails. Brunch is great too

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Comfort food for every taste. My go to for hosting friends for a delicious dinner, creative cocktails and a variety of brews.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Chill, fun local spot with good staff and ample taps. Good $ (3) happy hour drinks plus food.  Above average eats.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great atmosphere, cocktails and food.  Service is on point.  Bring your dog of he or she is well behaved.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Been here twice now. Both times were kinda meh. Meat came out overcooked (though the server was A+ about getting it fixed). The only standout was the white bean cassoulet, which was awesome.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great place to go and hangout the food is good and they have a large patio. The bar is a decent size as well

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: i love eating here. the service was very welcoming and observant. it has a nice atmosphere.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text:
It's a decent, slightly upscale bar and grill

Food is mostly burgers, sandwiches and salads - some with a slightly Swedish twist (e.g. Swedish meatballs)

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Decent beer on tap, killer grub. Weekends you'll find dogs of all types outside on the patio. It's all sorts of win!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Hands down my favorite place in NoHo. The entire staff is amazing and I love the atmosphere. Try the daily drink and the seasonal hummus!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: My favorite place on magnolia. Awesome drinks and some of the best food ive had. The patio is very nice as well

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Cool spot with varying drink options. A bit on the pricey side and not many options for vegetarians. Cauliflower was pretty good though.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great food & beer. Food is a little expensive for what you get, but it's delicious. Everyone there was very nice.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Pretty chill bar. They have a outdoor seating area and a second smaller bar at the back. $3 happy hour specials on food and drinks

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Good food, decent prices and great service but nothing to WOW about but definitely coming back to try the rest of the menu.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Craft cocktails, high quality food. Great bar and atmosphere. Outdoor seating and dog friendly too.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Always enjoy this place. Who doesn't love a patio for dogs. Good cocktails. Good food.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Loved  everything about this place. Food is amazing. Drinks are fabulous. And dog friendly too.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Great food, fun vibe and nice relaxing patio. Servers are as always nice and upbeat.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: We love this place. Great food! My favorite are the mini corn dogs!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: I have been here a handful of times with my friends who live down the street and everytime we go in we are welcomed with kindess and very fast service. The food is incredible!!!!

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: The food was delicious, good beer options and they're dog friendly.

Name: The Fat Dog
Review Text: Chill place to grab a bite or drink. Really good happy hour 3-7 $3 drinks $5 wells. Nice lil patio

Name: The Fat Dog
